TEXT.TITLE: ROCHESTER GAS AND ELECTRIC <RGS> BEGINS OFFER
TEXT.BODY: Rochester Gas and Electric Corp said it began a public offering of 300,000 shares of 8.25 pct preferred stock, Series R at 100 dlrs per share. Proceeds will be used to redeem its 10.84 pct preferred shares. Reuter
